      • log

        public static void log​(GameLogger.LogLevel level,
                       java.lang.String label,
                       java.lang.String msg)
        Print using a specific level and a label.
        Parameters:
        level - a LogLevel that specifies which level to print at
        label - a label to use, specifying where the message is coming from
        msg - the actual message

      • setPrintLevel

        public static void setPrintLevel​(GameLogger.LogLevel level)
        Set the minimum print level. By default it is `LogLevel.DEBUG`. Priority goes: `ERROR`, `INFO`, `DEBUG`.
        Parameters:
        level - LogLevel to set the minimum to
